metadata.title: CVE-2023-1814 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Safe Browsing in GoogleChrome prior to 112.0.5615.49 allowed a remote attacker to bypass downloadchecking via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
